text: yAqhItyA#haq jyOti#rEqvAsmi#n dadhAti taqnuvAq vA EqSha hi#nastiq ya(gm) hiqnastiq mA hi(gm)#sIstaqnuvA$ praqjA ityA#ha praqjABya# Eqvaina(gm)# Samayatiq rakShA(gm)#siq vA Eqtad-yaqj~ja(gm) sa#cantEq yadana# uqthsarjaq-tyakra#ndaqdityanvA#haq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyAq ana#sA vahaqn-tyapa#citi-mEqvAsmi#n dadhAtiq tasmA#danaqsvI ca# raqthI cAti#thInAq-mapa#citatamAq - [  ] 10
